heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_invoker
heroes.bio_loc:
在创立之初，魔法本质上是一门记忆的艺术，有些人认为这才是其最强力的形式。它无需任何科技，也无需魔杖或者其他施法媒介，只需要你有一颗魔法师的心。所有的那些祭祀里面的象形符号也仅仅是帮助记忆的手段，初衷是为了让施法者能够回想起施放法术时那大量的细节以及步骤。

在那个年代，最伟大的法师就是记忆天赋最高的人，然而魔法祈唤实在是太过艰深，因此所有的法师不得不有所专攻。即使是最刻苦的法师，将一辈子奉献给魔法，最多也只能掌握三到四个法术。普通的法师能掌握两个就心满意足了，而对于那些乡下的法师来说，只掌握一个法术也再正常不过——即使这样，在极少的真正需要使用魔法的场合，他还得借助魔典才能战胜自己的健忘。

然而，在那些早期的施法者中，有一个例外，一个智力超群，记忆力惊人的天才，以祈求者的名字为人们所知。在年少时，祈求者就已经掌握了不下十种法术。是的，不是四五个，也不是七个，而是十个，而且他还能毫不费力的施放这些法术。他学到过更多的法术，但是因为觉得没用，试过一次以后就彻底从脑中遗忘，这样才能为其他更为有用的法术留出空间。这些法术就是包括永生之术——能让施法者永生的法术，那些在世界之初吟唱了这个法术的人现在还活得好好的（除非他们被物质毁灭了）。

而大多数这样的准不朽者都低调地生活在我们中间，害怕他们的秘密泄露：然而祈求者不是一个喜欢隐藏自己天赋的人。他来自远古，比任何人都要博学，而他的心智还有余力让他去思考他无穷的自我价值...以及更多的法术——他在世界毁灭之时的漫长暮色中用来自娱自乐的法术。
heroes.hype_loc: 祈求者可以随意施展脑海中复杂的法术，充分做到随机应变。三种魔法元素的任意组合都可以产生十大魔法之一，意味着他向来都是有条不紊地毁灭敌人或者逃离追杀。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 利用一系列法术连招达到出神入化的效果

abilities.name: invoker_quas
abilities.desc_loc: Allows manipulation of ice elements. Active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> instances imbue Invoker with bonus hp regeneration. Passively grants bonus strength per level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>.
notes_loc: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
Will not break invisibility and can be cast while channeling.
facets_loc: <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> gains an additional level.

abilities.name: invoker_wex
abilities.desc_loc: Allows manipulation of storm elements. Active <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> instances imbue Invoker with bonus movement speed. Passively grants bonus agility per level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.
notes_loc: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
Will not break invisibility and can be cast while channeling.
facets_loc: <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> gains an additional level.

abilities.name: invoker_exort
abilities.desc_loc: Allows manipulation of fire elements. Active <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> instances imbue Invoker with bonus attack damage. Passively grants bonus intelligence per level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
notes_loc: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
Will not break invisibility and can be cast while channeling.
facets_loc: <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> gains an additional level.

abilities.name: invoker_invoke
abilities.desc_loc:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use. Invoke cooldown is reduced by %cooldown_reduction_per_orb% seconds for each orb level.

Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.
abilities.lore_loc: So begins a new age of knowledge.
notes_loc: The arrangement of instances does not matter.
Invoke will not cost mana or go on cooldown if the only effect is to swap the positions of existing spells.
Invoke will not break invisibility and can be cast while channeling.

abilities.name: invoker_cold_snap
abilities.desc_loc: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>.
notes_loc: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than %damage_trigger% after reductions.
facets_loc: When Cold Snap triggers, Invoker is healed %freeze_heal% hp and restores %freeze_mana% mana.

abilities.name: invoker_ghost_walk
abilities.desc_loc: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible and gaining health and mana regen. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.
notes_loc: The slow effect does not work on Spell Immune enemies.

abilities.name: invoker_tornado
abilities.desc_loc:
Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
notes_loc: Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.

abilities.name: invoker_emp
abilities.desc_loc: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after %delay% seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains %self_mana_restore_pct%%% of the mana drained.
notes_loc: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).

abilities.name: invoker_alacrity
abilities.desc_loc: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> and their damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
facets_loc: Alacrity grants bonus attack range when used on Invoker or any ranged units under his control.

abilities.name: invoker_chaos_meteor
abilities.desc_loc: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, and rolling further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
notes_loc: Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every %damage_interval% seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over %burn_duration% seconds.
The meteor moves at a speed of %travel_speed%.
facets_loc: Chaos Meteor has %bonus_area_of_effect% bonus radius and %bonus_travel_distance% bonus travel distance.

abilities.name: invoker_sun_strike
abilities.desc_loc: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
notes_loc: Gives vision of the target area before the strike.
Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.

abilities.name: invoker_forge_spirit
abilities.desc_loc: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage and armor are based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes. The number of spirits spawned is determined by the lower level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
notes_loc: Casting this ability will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.

abilities.name: invoker_ice_wall
abilities.desc_loc: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> and deals damage each second based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.

abilities.name: invoker_deafening_blast
abilities.desc_loc: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_invoker_2
talents.desc_loc: Releases {s:bonus_radial_count} additional Deafening Blasts around Invoker in a circular pattern.  An enemy can only be hit once per cast.

facets.description_loc:
Quas gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, Quas gains an additional level.

When Cold Snap triggers, Invoker is healed and restores some mana.

Aghanim's Scepter upgrades Ghost Walk and grants 2 current and max levels to Quas, increasing it to 10.

Aghanim's Shard upgrades Ice Wall.
facets.name: invoker_quas_focus

facets.description_loc:
Wex gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, Wex gains an additional level.

Alacrity grants bonus attack range when used on Invoker or range units under his control.

Aghanim's Scepter upgrades Tornado and grants 2 current and max levels to Wex, increasing it to 10.

Aghanim's Shard upgrades E.M.P.
facets.name: invoker_wex_focus

facets.description_loc:
Exort gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, Exort gains an additional level.

Chaos Meteor's radius and travel distance is increased.

Aghanim's Scepter upgrades Sun Strike and grants 2 current and max levels to Exort, increasing it to 10.

Aghanim's Shard upgrades Sun Strike.
facets.name: invoker_exort_focus

new_abilities.name: invoker_invoke
new_abilities.desc_loc:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use. Invoke cooldown is reduced by %cooldown_reduction_per_orb% seconds for each orb level.

Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.
new_abilities.lore_loc: So begins a new age of knowledge.
notes_loc: The arrangement of instances does not matter.
Invoke will not cost mana or go on cooldown if the only effect is to swap the positions of existing spells.
Invoke will not break invisibility and can be cast while channeling.
